name: The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore
address: 99, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025
about: The Ritz-Carlton, Bangalore, located in the heart of the city, offers luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and a tranquil spa. Experience legendary service in a sophisticated setting.

images.caption: Exterior view of The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore

name: The Oberoi, New Delhi
address: Dr. Zakir Hussain Marg, New Delhi, Delhi 110003
about: A landmark hotel in the heart of the capital, The Oberoi, New Delhi offers breathtaking views of Delhi Golf Course and Humayun's Tomb. It's a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary sophistication.

name: Taj Lake Palace, Udaipur
about: Appearing like a mirage in the middle of Lake Pichola, the Taj Lake Palace is one of the most romantic hotels in the world. This heritage hotel features majestic architecture and offers breathtaking views.

images.caption: Taj Lake Palace in Lake Pichola

name: Grand Hyatt Mumbai
address: Bandra Kurla Complex Vicinity, Off Western Express Highway, Santacruz East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400055
about: A multi-dimensional lifestyle complex, Grand Hyatt Mumbai offers a modern and luxurious retreat in the heart of the city, with award-winning dining, an international shopping plaza, and expansive rooms.

name: The Leela Palace Chennai
address: Adyar Seaface, MRC Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600028
about: The Leela Palace Chennai is a modern palace hotel overlooking the Bay of Bengal. It offers luxurious guestrooms, a world-class spa, and a collection of fine dining restaurants.

images.caption: The grand lobby of The Leela Palace

name: The Oberoi Amarvilas, Agra
address: Taj East Gate Rd, Paktola, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: Located just 600 meters from the Taj Mahal, this luxury hotel offers uninterrupted views of the monument from every room. Experience Mughal-inspired architecture and royal hospitality.

images.caption: View of Taj Mahal from the hotel

name: ITC Mughal, Agra
about: A tribute to Mughal architecture, this sprawling resort is set amidst 23 acres of lush gardens. It's a recipient of the prestigious Aga Khan Award for its Mughal-inspired design.

name: BrijRama Palace, Varanasi
address: Darbhanga Ghat, Dashashwamedh, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221001
about: One of the oldest structures in Varanasi, this palace hotel on the banks of the Ganges offers a unique heritage experience. It features traditional decor and stunning river views.

name: Taj Ganges, Varanasi
address: Nadesar Palace Grounds, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221002
about: Set amidst 40 acres of lush greenery, Taj Ganges offers a tranquil escape in the ancient city of Varanasi. Enjoy modern comforts, a large swimming pool, and serene gardens.

name: Renaissance Lucknow Hotel
address: Vipin Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010
about: A luxury hotel in the heart of Lucknow, offering stunning panoramic views of the city skyline from its rooftop infinity pool. Experience modern design and exceptional service.
